Name: NARRATOR
Text: After a hard first day, you are fast asleep.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: Dreaming of logging trees, all of the forest staying silent.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: Soon there are no tress standing.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: A wind blows between the stumps ruffling the feathers of a lonely tawny owl.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: You wake up to a knock on your door.
